bot_about: I was crafted by the mighty hands of Raunhofer aka Strogg.r, Feb 4. 2017. My purpose in this world is hazy, perhaps I'm just a simple tunneler?
bot_mention: Do you await some ominous sign or portent from the Undergods of Fire and Soil?
It is the Witching Hour. Curses are half-price.
Hic! Your creatures demand cakesh and fine winesh.
